sn47.10:2.4: See my note on AN 7.49. I don’t see how BB can reconcile his translation (based on the commentary) with the fact that visesa here is singular.
sn47.10:6.3: It’s difficult to get around “fever” here for parilaha, obviously it’s not talking about illness.
sn47.10:8.3: See note on AN 7.61 for pacchapure.
